forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Drizzle
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As twilight settles over Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere exudes a gentle embrace of mostly sunny skies, transitioning into a deeper, more contemplative evening. The temperature, softening like a tender whisper, hovers around a mild 64 degrees, with a slight dip on the horizon as the sun descends further. A light west-southwest breeze dances through, carrying with it the fresh scent of the Pacific, punctuated by occasional gusts that playfully tousle hair and fabrics alike. While the day holds a promise of clarity, an encroaching marine layer suggests that the evening may not indulge in the same luminous warmth. 

As the night unfolds, expect the clouds to gradually envelop the city, casting a cooler veil. A subtle chance of drizzle may linger, hinting at nature's soft hand brushing against shoulders and umbrellas, urging one to dress thoughtfully in layers—perhaps a light sweater over a comfortable cotton shirt, accompanied by sensible footwear for those impromptu walks in search of a cozy café. An evening stroll along the waterfront could offer serendipitous encounters with the little joys that San Francisco offers, while the charm of a quiet night at home with a good book feels equally inviting—each option perfectly attuned to this delicate and nuanced evening.
